Subject: Appliance is running on low disk space
Description: We are having space issue which may affect the functionality of EPP server, Kindly let know how we can free space.
What_We_Know__c:
Connected remote along with Adrian to assist Vignesh.
We logged into SSH to remove old backup files from /var/eppfiles/logbackup and /var/log/backups to remove backups older than 6 months. This allowed the client to clear more than 50% of their storage. Also, even though they had 89GB of shadows, due to the Audit Log Backup, they shadows will be removed as well freeing up more space.
Next_Steps__c: Will send a follow up note and will wait for their confirmation.
Solution_Comment__c:
Dispace cleared and turned off the shadowing option.
----
Client reported that the issue has been fixed after clearing up the disk space.
